Classes/AgoraARKit.html#/s:10AgoraARKitA.name: agoraAppId
Classes/AgoraARKit.html#/s:10AgoraARKitA.abstract: The agoraAppId is a static value that is used to connect to the Agora.io service. Get your Agora App Id from https://console.agora.io

Classes/AgoraARKit.html#/s:10AgoraARKitA.name: agoraToken
Classes/AgoraARKit.html#/s:10AgoraARKitA.abstract: The agoraToken is a static value that is used to as the user’s channel token. You can set either a dynamic token or a temp token. Generate a temp token usic https://console.agora.io. Default is nil

Classes/ARBroadcaster.html#/c:@M@AgoraAR.abstract: AgoraARKit uses the viewDidLoad method to create the UI, set up the Agora engine configuration, set the ARSCNViewDelegate / ARSessionDeleagates, set up the off screen renderer and configure the SceneView’s

Classes/ARBroadcaster.html#/c:@M@AgoraAR.abstract: AgoraARKit pauses the AR session within the viewWillDisappear

Classes/ARBroadcaster.html#/c:@M@AgoraAR.name: viewDidDisappear(_:)
Classes/ARBroadcaster.html#/c:@M@AgoraAR.abstract: Since Apple does not provide explicit de-initializers for the ARSCN, AgoraARKit use viewDidDisappear to free up resources and clean up the SceneView references.

Classes/ARBroadcaster.html#/c:@CM@AgoraA.abstract: Occurs when the token expires in 30 seconds.

Classes/ARBroadcaster.html#/c:@CM@AgoraA.abstract: Occurs when the token expires.

Classes/ARBroadcaster.html#/c:@CM@AgoraA.abstract: Occurs when a remote user’s audio stream is muted/unmuted.

Classes/ARBroadcaster.html#/c:@CM@AgoraA.abstract: Reports which user is the loudest speaker over a period of time.

Classes/ARBroadcaster.html#/c:@CM@AgoraA.abstract: Occurs when a remote user’s video stream playback pauses/resumes.

Classes/ARBroadcaster.html#/c:@CM@AgoraA.abstract: Occurs when the remote video state changes.

Classes/ARBroadcaster.html#/c:@CM@AgoraA.name: rtcEngine(_:receiveStreamMessageFromUid:streamId:data:)
Classes/ARBroadcaster.html#/c:@CM@AgoraA.abstract: Occurs when the local user receives the data stream from a remote user within five seconds.

Classes/ARBroadcaster.html#/c:@CM@AgoraA.name: rtcEngine(_:didOccurStreamMessageErrorFromUid:streamId:error:missed:cached:)
Classes/ARBroadcaster.html#/c:@CM@AgoraA.abstract: Occurs when the local user does not receive the data stream from the remote user within five seconds.

Classes/ARAudience.html.name: ARAudience
Classes/ARAudience.html.abstract: The ARAudience is a UIViewController that implements all the needed methods for the viewer (aundience member) of the AR Live Stream. The class provides a manged UI for the audience user.

Classes/ARVideoSource.html.name: ARVideoSource
Classes/ARVideoSource.html.abstract: A custom video source for the AgoraRtcEngine. This class conforms to the AgoraVideoSourceProtocol and is used to pass the AR pixel buffer as a video source of the Agora stream.

Classes/AgoraARKit.html.name: AgoraARKit
Classes/AgoraARKit.html.abstract: The AgoraARKit object provides static properties to be used when initializing the Agora engine

Classes/AgoraLobbyVC.html.name: AgoraLobbyVC
Classes/AgoraLobbyVC.html.abstract: The AgoraLobbyVC is a UIViewController that provides a manged UIView that gives the user the ability to enter a channel name and choose their role as either a Broadcaster or Audience. Based on their selection an ARBroadcaster or ARAudience ViewController is presented.

Global%20Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global%20Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
